case_title: MUHAMMAD BAKHSH and others vs Mst. JAINDAI and others
legal_issues: Provisions of M.L.R. 115 regarding partial inalienability of certain holdings
Retrospective application of un-Islamic law declaration

key_mutations.status: Cancelled and remanded by Assistant Commissioner on 1984-12-23
Cancelled and remanded by Assistant Commissioner on 1984-12-23

legal_findings: Provisions of M.L.R. 115 declared un-Islamic with retrospective effect
Vendors responsible for ensuring compliance with legal provisions during sales
Additional Commissioner acted beyond jurisdiction in remanding certain mutations
directions: Mutations must be sanctioned to give effect to all sales made between the parties
Declaration of para. 24 of M.L.R. 115 as un-Islamic will apply retrospectively unless rights are jeopardized
